Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a game-tying 398-foot home run off Mets reliever Phil Maton
Garrett Mitchell hit a two-run home run off Maton, giving Milwaukee its first lead
The Mets scored 3 runs in the first inning on a single by Brandon Nimmo
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets had 15 hits but only two for extra bases and nine walks
The Mets left nine runners on base and went 2-for-11 with runners in scoring position
Mets starter Sean Manaea held Milwaukee to just two earned runs in five innings
Mets relievers threw two scoreless innings before Maton took the ball in the eighth
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pete Alonso tripped over his bat after grounding to shortstop
